name: Shadowbeak

ability.name: Modified Dna
ability.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Dark attacks while mounted.

description:
Forbidden existence born of madness.
As he lost his genetic relationship with the other Pals, he may no longer be considered one of them.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Dark Ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Spirit Flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Nightmare Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Divine Disaster
skills.description: Shadowbeak's exclusive skill. Charges forward while generating orbs of light that automatically capture enemies. The orbs automatically capture enemies, before releasing a barrage of lasers.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
